release.notes:
CD in 12" x 6" cardboard longbox.  Printed in U.S.A.

From the hype sticker:
Limited Edition EP Featuring "Smells Like Teen Spirit" 82399-EP.

Track durations not listed on the release.

Including the following CD-Release:
https://www.discogs.com/de/Tori-Amos-Crucify/release/427488

videos.title: Tori Amos - "Smells Like Teen Spirit" [Official Audio]
videos.description:
From Little Earthquakes (Deluxe CD Edition). 
Tori Amos’ debut album, Little Earthquakes, and 2nd album, Under the Pink, have been remastered and compiled for the first time in a deluxe 2CD format which includes a bonus disc of b-sides and rartities. 
 
B
